metadata.synopsis: A flaming fist solider nervously attempts to challenge a githyanki warrior. The gith is essentially an alien to the lowly soldier; he can't help but feel intimidated.

0.speaker: Sarth Baretha
0.text: Your babbling tires me, istik. Move your carcass!
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Authoritative demandingNodeContext: Authoritative demanding. 'istik' =  'Stranger' - Catch-all term for non-gith. Pronounced Iss-tick

1.speaker: Gauntlet Dion
1.text: B-by order of the Flaming Fist, halt!
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Unintelligent confusionNodeContext: Unintelligent confusion

2.speaker: Sarth Baretha
2.text: Or what? Show us what you can do, worm.
2.context: NodeContext: Htak'-a meaning "Die!" in gith language
